ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: and by what you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and what you do not see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: And by oath of those you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by whatsoever you see not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that which you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: and by that you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And all that ye see not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: as well as all that you cannot see:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And that which ye see not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: and what you do not see:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by whatsoever you see not,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: and all that you do not see,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And by what you do not see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And what you do not see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [69:39] and all that you do not see: of them, in other words, [I swear] by all creatures:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: And all that ye see not) people of Mecca; it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. the sky and the earth, and that which you do not see, i.e. the Garden and the Fire; and it also said that this means: I swear by what you see, the sun and the moon, and by that which you do not see, the Throne and the Stool; and it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and that which you do not see, Gabriel. Allah swore by all these.
